About Me

I'm a college student and aspiring software developer.

I love what I do

When I am not doing school work I like to spend my time delevoping my career. I am currently working on improving my skills as a web developer. My goal is to be able to freelance over the summer to earn some money and valuable experience in the field. I also have many projects I would like to make a realilty with these newfound skills.

Chess

I play chess daily and began studying it seriously in July 2021. I am part of the GMU chess club and regularly compete in USCF tournaments.

Football & Basketball

I have been playing sports all my life. I played basketball and football throughout middle and high school. I now enjoy playing in GMU's intermural flag football and basketball leagues.

Reading

I recently started reading again after not being able to find anything good on netflix. I enjoy mostly fiction and literature classics. However, I also learn a lot from non-fiction. Feel free to give me recommendations!
